name: Cheesus Christ: Reborn II
description:
Cheesus Christ: Reborn II

I'm gonna level with you. This is basically a shitpost of a game that I made in just four hours as a birthday present for a friend. It's a silly game. Will you enjoy it? Maybe. Is it the next Titanfall or Portal? Absolutely not. If you want to just spend some time playing a silly little game for like under an hour then absolutely go for it. If not then go try out some other game or some of my actual games, either the ones on my itch.io profile or Craterbound on Steam. Regardless, have a great day!

Background

You play as a random person who is locked in a room with evil sentient floating cheese monsters. You are armed with a single sword and your objective is to survive to Wave 100. If you survive that far you will win the game. Anything short of that and you're a loser, plain and simple. Comment below your top scores and if you won or not.

Controls and Disclaimer

Movement: WASD

Main Attack: Left Click

Grenade Attack: Right Click

That's it. You can also left click on menus obviously.

The leaderboard system does not super work. This game was made in four hours so if you find any bugs don't bother commenting them, I don't really care. I am writing this at 2 AM if you can't tell. Just try to enjoy the game for what it is!
